hero03.title: Find Kiki's Empanadas on the Go
hero03.subtitle: Authentic Argentinian empanadas available around Orlando. Perfect for your next event or a quick delicious bite.

schedule.title: Where to Find Us
schedule.description: Check out our schedule to catch our food truck at a location near you, or book us for your next event.

testimonials.feedback: The food truck was the highlight of our festival! Everyone loved the empanadas.
testimonials.author: Festival Organizer

testimonials.feedback: So glad I found Kiki's food truck. The empanadas are incredible, and the service is fantastic.
testimonials.author: Patron

cta.title: Book Our Food Truck for Your Event
cta.subtitle: Bring a unique culinary experience to your guests with Kiki Empanadas.

faqs.question: Can the food truck cater to dietary restrictions?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a selection of empanadas that can accommodate various dietary needs. Please let us know in advance.

faqs.question: How much space does the food truck require?
faqs.answer: Our food truck needs a flat, stable surface of at least 20 feet by 10 feet to operate safely and efficiently.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have questions or want to book our food truck? Fill out the form below!
